# Prep for theta ~ behavioral analyses

Compiles all the ieeg data for given time locks, but does not bind with the behavioral files

Run by knitting


## Merge with Delta

```{r merge-delta-data-and-combine-hc}

#  turnaround Data
slch2_turnaround_df <- compile_ieeg_csv_files(roi = "hc", 
                                                  sub = "SLCH002", 
                                                  sample_freq = 1000, 
                                                  timelock_folder = "last_away",
                                                  keyword_include = "trial_delta", keyword_exclude = "999")
  
bjh16_turnaround_df <- compile_ieeg_csv_files(roi = "hc", 
                                                  sub = "BJH016", 
                                                  sample_freq = 1000, 
                                                  timelock_folder = "last_away",
                                                  keyword_include = "trial_delta", keyword_exclude = "999")

bjh21_turnaround_df <- compile_ieeg_csv_files(roi = "hc", 
                                                  sub = "BJH021", 
                                                  sample_freq = 1000, 
                                                  timelock_folder = "last_away",
                                                  keyword_include = "trial_delta", keyword_exclude = "999")

bjh25_turnaround_df <- compile_ieeg_csv_files(roi = "hc", 
                                                  sub = "BJH025", 
                                                  sample_freq = 1000, 
                                                  timelock_folder = "last_away",
                                                  keyword_include = "trial_delta", keyword_exclude = "999")


ll10_turnaround_df <- compile_ieeg_csv_files(roi = "hc", 
                                                  sub = "LL10", 
                                                  sample_freq = 512, 
                                                  timelock_folder = "last_away",
                                                  keyword_include = "trial_delta", keyword_exclude = "999")

ll12_turnaround_df <- compile_ieeg_csv_files(roi = "hc", 
                                                  sub = "LL12", 
                                                  sample_freq = 512,  
                                                  timelock_folder = "last_away",
                                                  keyword_include = "trial_delta", keyword_exclude = "999")

ll13_turnaround_df <- compile_ieeg_csv_files(roi = "hc", 
                                                  sub = "LL13", 
                                                  sample_freq = 512, 
                                                  timelock_folder = "last_away",
                                                  keyword_include = "trial_delta", keyword_exclude = "999")


# Bind together
turnaround_df <- rbind(slch2_turnaround_df, bjh16_turnaround_df, bjh21_turnaround_df, bjh25_turnaround_df,
                  ll10_turnaround_df, ll12_turnaround_df, ll13_turnaround_df)

# save #
write_csv(turnaround_df, path(here(), "munge", "delta_hc_all_subs_turnaround.csv"))

```
